//program to demonstrate dimensional Array
public class p23 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int a[][]= {{1,2},{3,4}};
		
		for(int i=0;i<2;i++)
		{
			for(int j=0;j<2;j++)
			{
				System.out.print(a[i][j]+"\t");
			}
			System.out.print("\n");
		}
	}

}
*************************output***************************************
1	2	
3	4
